### Bulk Argon System Tender

#### Reference Number: cb-688-36163135
#### Amendment Number: 7
#### Solicitation Number: 5000066708RR
#### Publication Date: November 6, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: November 22, 2023, at 15:00:00

#### Project Overview

The Government of Canada is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to provide a Bulk Argon System for the Canada Centre for Inland Waters (CCIW) located in Burlington, Ontario. The system will transport argon gas from a main tank near the warehouse to the 4th and 7th floors of the main building.

#### Tender Description

**Scope of Work**

* Provide all necessary labor, materials, equipment, project management, and contract administration work to complete the scope of work.
* Install approximately 800 meters of argon piping infrastructure to facilitate the transportation of argon gas from the main tank to the 4th and 7th floors.
* Furnish systems ready for satisfactory operation of laboratories equipment that uses argon gas.
* Coordination of work with existing structures, ceiling systems, lighting fixtures, fan coil units, piping, and ductwork.

**Site Visit**

A mandatory site visit will be held during the second phase of the tender process.

#### Estimated Value

The estimated value of the project is between $400,000.00 and $500,000.00 (excluding taxes).

#### Documents

Documents related to this tender may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Bidder Instructions

Please note that this is the first phase of a two-phase competition. Bidders who are prequalified will be invited to provide a financial bid on the project in the second phase.
